name: Game Breaker
description:
DISCLAIMER: FOR YOUR HEALTH: IF YOU HAVE ANY INSUE WITH PHOTOSENSITIVITY. DON'T PLAY THIS GAME.

• Game Breaker is a jump platform game where you have to learn by your failures. Use the correct jump to progress and be rewarded. Jump up to reach the throne to get the real reward of the game.

• You are inside the event horizon where everything is possible unless get out of it.

• Legends say you have to Break the Game to manifest what is beyond the event horizon.
What is beyond the event horizon is unknown.

• Aim down then fire and jump to see how far you can go. It's like the Rocket Jump but you can use in the air.

• Use and improve two types of pulse backward jump to reach all platforms. Each time you jump the frequency you see will change.

• The game have tons of Secrets and Easter Eggs. Easy ones and Impossible ones.

It is barely impossible to:

B R E A K
T H E
G A M E

I N
G A M E
B R E A K E R

T O

B E C O M E
T H E



Do you think you have the neatness?
